import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useSelector,useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {getAllCart} from './../actions/products'; import CLoader from "./Layouts/CLoader"; import {deleteCartItem} from './../actions/products'; const MyCart = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [listCartItem, setListCartItem] = useState([]); const product = useSelector(state => state.productsApi); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getAllCart()); },[]); useEffect(()=>{ if(product?.cartData?.data !== undefined || product?.cartData?.data?.length > 0){ setListCartItem(product?.cartData?.data); } },[product]); useEffect(()=>{ if(product?.cartData?.status){ dispatch(getAllCart()); } },[product?.cartData?.status]); //= (product?.cartData?.data === undefined) ? [] : product?.cartData?.data; const handleRemoveCartItem = (pid) => { const cid = { 'cid' : pid } console.log(pid) dispatch(deleteCartItem(cid)); //const updateCart = listCartItem.filter(item => item.pid !== pid); //setListCartItem(updateCart); } return ( <> { product.isLoading == true ? :

Cart Summary

{ listCartItem.map((cart ,i) => { return ( ) } ) }
Product Qtd Quantity Unit price Total price Action

{cart.product_name}
{cart.no_of_qty}
Rs {cart.single_price}/- Rs {cart.sp_total_price}/- {if(window.confirm('Are you sure to delete this item from cart ?')){ handleRemoveCartItem(btoa(cart.id))};}}>
{/*

Coupon Code

If you have a coupon code, please enter it in the box below

*/}

Instruction for seller

If you have some information for the seller you can leave them in the box below

{/*

Order Details

*/}

Shipping and additionnal costs are calculated based on values you have entered

{/*
Subtotal
148,827.53€

-133,944.77€
New Subtotal
14,882.75€
Tax
2,976.55€
*/}
Total
Rs {product?.cartData?.amt} /-
} ) } export default MyCart
